name: Under Siege
description:
"Under Siege" is a top-down arena shooter. The player takes on the role of a fearless tanker. The goal is to survive in the arena and defeat all enemies.

Don't let enemy tanks to destroy your vehicle. Crush enemies and earn money to upgrade your tank!

Control the tank with the keys - WASD
Rotate the tower with the mouse
Shoot regular projectiles - LMB
Place mines with - Spacebar
Use the special projectile - RMB

Game Features:
  • Nice graphics
  • Classic gameplay and responsive controls
  • 20 challenging levels
  • 4 types of enemies with different weapons and stats
